Publish.LongDescription:
**Infinite Demand** is part of the CSL2 Demand Control suite - bringing back this essential mod from Cities: Skylines for a better sandbox experience.
This mod sets all zone demands (Residential, Commercial, and Industrial) to maximum levels, ensuring that: - New zones get built immediately when conditions are met - No waiting for demand to accumulate - Perfect for sandbox-style city building - No performance impact - uses lightweight Harmony patches
**Features:** - Maximum residential demand (all densities) - Maximum commercial demand - Maximum industrial demand (including storage and office buildings) - Works seamlessly with game simulation
Built with .NET 8 for optimal performance and compatibility with the latest game versions.
